Message: CONGRATULATIONS, YOU FUCKED UP THE SERVER'S STORAGE!!!, was it even worth it?
Name: Wanderer
requirement: Explore all bop biomes.. you psycho.

Message: From the moment I understood the weakness of my flesh, it disgusted me.
Name: Suit Up

Message: Greed. You will find it a common cause for war.
Name: The One Percent
requirement: Make a beacon of full diamonds blocks, max size

Message: ROCK AND STONE BROTHER!
Name: Go below y-level 20

Message: Jesse, we need to dig.
Name: Breaking the Maze

Message: Twilight Forest - MC 1.20.4 – 4.4.2276, 26/05/2024, Not yet implemented.
Item: <infinite_revolution:infinite_key>, <minecraft:nether_star>.withTag({"Quark:RuneColor": 16, ench: [], display: {Lore: ["It is made of paper mache", "-Made in China"], Name: "Infinite Revolution Star"}, "Quark:RuneAttached": 1 as byte})
Name: So Castle Very Now

Message: At long last. No king rules forever, my son.
Name: Clear Skies

Message: If you cut the head of the Hydra, another will come out. Hydra Dominatus!.
Name: Hydra Slayer

Message: Praise the sun!
Name: Carminite Acclimation

Message: Father? Is it... over?
Name: Bring Out Your Dead
requirement: Kill the Lich and obtain the sceptre

Message: Snek? Snek? SNEK!
Name: Time To Even The Scales
requirement: Kill the Naga and obtain a scale

Message: Monstrous Size Has No Intrinsic Merit, Unless Inordinate Exsanguination Be Considered A Virtue.
Item: <xreliquary:mob_charm>.withTag({type: 9 as byte}), <infinite_revolution:trinium_lootbox>, <twilightforest:block_storage:1>, <quark:ancient_tome>.withTag({StoredEnchantments: [{lvl: 5 as short, id: 32 as short}]})
Name: Tears of Fire

Message: Shadow and light are two sides of the same coin. One cannot exist without the other.
Name: Twilight Forest

Message: MANKIND IS DEAD. BLOOD IS FUEL. HELL IS FULL
Item: <thermalfoundation:coin:1>*3, <forge:bucketfilled>.withTag({"Quark:RuneColor": 16, ench: [{}], FluidName: "evilcraftblood", HideFlags: 1, Amount: 1000, display: {Lore: ["\"RECONSTRUCT WHAT?!\" - Hakita"], Name: "Bucket of V2"}, "Quark:RuneAttached": 1}), <liquid:evilcraftblood>*5
Name: We need to go deeper

Message: I used to be an adventurer like you. Then I took an arrow in the knee...
Item: <minecraft:spawn_egg>.withTag({"Quark:RuneColor": 16, ench: [{}], HideFlags: 1, display: {Lore: ["ᚹᚺᚨᛏ ᛁᛋ ᛒᛖᛏᛏᛖᚱ - ᛏᛟ ᛒᛖ ᛒᛟᚱᚾ ᚷᛟᛟᛞ, ᛟᚱ ᛏᛟ ᛟᚡᛖᚱᚲᛟᛗᛖ ᚤᛟᚢᚱ ᛖᚡᛁᛚ ᚾᚨᛏᚢᚱᛖ ᛏᚺᚱᛟᚢᚷᚺ ᚷᚱᛖᚨᛏ ᛖᚠᚠᛟᚱᛏ"], Name: "Ender Dragon's Testicle"}, "Quark:RuneAttached": 1 as byte})
Name: Free The End

Message: You liked that testicle too much…
Name: The End… Again..

Message: Look at you, flying majestically through the air. Like an eagle...piloting a blimp.
Name: Great View From Up Here

Message: Now you can finally fly… Wait.
Name: Sky’s the limit

Message: Better to admit you walked through the wrong door than spend your life in the wrong room.
Item: <minecraft:diamond_hoe>.withTag({"Quark:RuneColor": 16, ench: [{}], Unbreakable: 1, HideFlags: 1, display: {Lore: ["The pain of discipline is temporary, The pain of regret is forever."], Name: "Your Biggest Mistake."}, "Quark:RuneAttached": 1 as byte})
Name: Serious Dedication

Message: You’ve met with a terrible fate, haven’t you?
Item: <minecraft:milk_bucket>, <minecraft:paper>.withTag({"Quark:RuneColor": 16, ench: [{}], HideFlags: 1, display: {Lore: ["This document classifies you as a dangerous biohazard with unknown diseases."], Name: "Official Biohazard Certificate"}, "Quark:RuneAttached": 1 as byte})
Name: How Did We Get Here?

Message: Death is inevitable. Our fear of it makes us play safe, blocks out emotion. It's a losing game. Without passion you are already dead.
Item: <minecraft:milk_bucket>,<minecraft:potion>.withTag({"Quark:RuneColor": 16, ench: [{}], CustomPotionEffects: [{Ambient: 1, Duration: 2147483647, Id: 7, Amplifier: 9999}], CustomPotionColor: 0, HideFlags: 1, display: {Lore: ["\"WARNING: USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!\"", "\"Keep away from children.\""], Name: "Liquid Death"}, "Quark:RuneAttached": 1 as byte})
Name: A Furious cocktail
